decisions.rationale: Proceed with governed bundle artifacts using link-only intake.
Keep report and metrics stable; timestamps reserved for stamp.json.

findings.summary: Fake OSS installer sites are used to distribute RMM malware via trusted developer tooling lookalikes.
Malicious OSS package volume reached ~454k in 2025, increasing supply-chain exposure.
WinRAR CVE-2025-8088 remains exploited by nation-linked actors via archive-based payload delivery.
WorldLeaks data theft claims highlight extortion via bulk exfiltration without encryption.
AI-generated, real-time malicious JavaScript raises the bar for static detection.
Supply-chain attacks expand through cloud integrations and SaaS trust relationships.
Phishing and credential theft remain core initial access vectors for ransomware/extortion operations.
